retrieval.storage.index

Class PictureIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.index.PictureIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class PictureIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Picture index (not visual word index!) Just store meta-data about indexed pictures: id, path and number of patchs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
